sentences.sContent: Calvinist Christianity has a culture of phenomenal industry.
sentences.sContent_eng: Calvinist Christianity has a culture of phenomenal industry.
sentences.sCn: 基督教加尔文主义拥有瞩目的产业文化。

sentences.sContent: InGermany, for example, Prussian and Calvinist beliefs about the value ofrising early are still pervasive.
sentences.sContent_eng: InGermany, for example, Prussian and Calvinist beliefs about the value ofrising early are still pervasive.
sentences.sCn: 譬如在德国，普鲁士人和加尔文主义者关于早起的信仰仍具有说服性。

sentences.sContent: The term “Islamic Calvinist” has been used to describe the devout businessmen of central Turkey, who use religious networks to accumulate capital and extend their activities.
sentences.sContent_eng: The term “Islamic Calvinist” has been used to describe the devout businessmen of central Turkey, who use religious networks to accumulate capital and extend their activities.
sentences.sCn: “伊斯兰加尔文主义者”被用来形容土耳其中部虔诚的商人，他们利用宗教的关系网络来集聚资金和扩大他们的商业活动。

trans.tranOther: A Calvinist is a member of the Calvinist church
